text.sentence: Hello All- I thought I'd drop everyone a line to say hello.
I'm glad to hear that everyone is on celebrity watch.
I've seen none, let alone anyone with bang me against the headboard beauty.
I am a minor league baseball player though, does that count for anything?
I'm sorry to say that I won't be able to make it back for the fourth of July festivities, but I'm always there in spirit.
If anyone has a burning desire to see Lexington Kentucky, I'm your guy.
It is the tabacco capital of the world.
I just wanted to tell everyone hello, and that I miss everyone.
As insane as that may be.
take care of each other, we are all we have sometimes.
